name: Funny AND creepy
reviewBody: This movie was really great. The acting was excellent from all four actors (and the mimes showed real professionalism), but the direction was the phenomenal part. I would call this a minimalist comedy, like Woody Allen or Jim Jarmusch used to do. A majority of the movie is not humor-based, but the humor that's there is high-quality. The plot is pretty clear from the description above, no need to repeat it. The creepy part comes from the fact that there is NO background music and some strange things happen. It's not scary, but a little tense at times. There are a few slow, dull parts that don't add to anything, so it loses a couple points there. Otherwise, I recommend this movie to any adult. It's probably a little too subtle for children.
